text: Kattoor is a village in Pathanamthitta district, Kerala, India. ==Language== Malayalam is the native language of Kattoor. ==Politics== Kattoor is a part of Pathanamthitta Loksabha constituency. Mr. Anto Antony is the current Member of Parliament of the constituency. ==Weather== The climate of the place is moderate and pleasant. Tropical climate is prevailed here throughout the year. ==Transportation== The major transportation service of this place is provided by Kerala State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC). ==Educational Institutions== * N.S.S High School, Kattoor * N.S.S T.T.I, Cherukole ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Villages in Pathanamthitta district
title: Kattoor, Pathanamthitta
